p: This study found that the pathogen spectrum of HFMD in Shaanxi Province has changed, and the major serotypes EV-A71, CV-A16 and CV-A6 alternated or co-epidemic. Therefore, it is necessary to strengthen the long-term surveillance and research of EVs, to understand the epidemiological characteristics and genetic variation of the EVs so as to provide a scientific basis for the early warning and prevention and control of HFMD.
